ml_unsupervised module¶

ml_unsupervised.run_iforest(X: DataFrame, *, contamination: float = 0.05, min_score: float | None = None, random_state: int = 42, n_estimators: int = 200, n_jobs: int = -1) → Tuple[IsolationForest, DataFrame][source]¶

Executes IsolationForest on X. - contamination: target fraction of anomalies (quantile) - min_score: if > 0, requires that anomaly_score >= min_score as well

Returns:

(iforest_model, df_scores): IsolationForest and dataframe scores

ml_unsupervised.run_kmeans_outlier(X: DataFrame, *, n_clusters: int = 5, contamination: float = 0.05, min_score: float | None = None, random_state: int = 42, standardize: bool = True) → Tuple[Dict[str, Any], DataFrame][source]¶

Use K-means as baseline for outliers: - distance to the cluster centroid as anomaly_score. - contamination: target fraction of anomalies. - min_score: if > 0, requires anomaly_score >= min_score.

Args:

X (pd.DataFrame): Pandas DataFrame n_clusters (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 5. contamination (float, optional): contamination fraction.. Defaults to 0.05. min_score (float | None, optional): requires minimum anomaly_score. Defaults to None. random_state (int, optional): Initial state. Defaults to 42. standardize (bool, optional): Try StandardScaler. Defaults to True.

Returns:

Tuple[Dict[str, Any], pd.DataFrame]: Kmeans dict and Pandas DataFrame

ml_unsupervised.run_lof(X: DataFrame, *, contamination: float = 0.05, min_score: float | None = None, n_neighbors: int = 20, standardize: bool = True) → Tuple[LocalOutlierFactor, DataFrame][source]¶

Executes LOF on X. - contamination: target fraction of anomalies - min_score: if > 0, requires anomaly_score >= min_score

Args:

X (pd.DataFrame): Pandas DataFrame contamination (float, optional): contamination fraction. Defaults to 0.05. min_score (float | None, optional): requires minimum anomaly_score. Defaults to None. n_neighbors (int, optional): LOF neighbors. Defaults to 20. standardize (bool, optional): Try StandardScaler. Defaults to True.

Returns:

Tuple[LocalOutlierFactor, pd.DataFrame]: LOF and dataframe
